shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the first local video frame is published.
Callback when the first local video frame is published.
Callback when the first local video frame is published.
Callback when the first local video frame is published.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int elapsed)? onFirstLocalVideoFramePublished;
public virtual void OnFirstLocalVideoFramePublished(RtcConnection connection, int elapsed) {}

section.p:
The SDK triggers this callback in the following scenarios:
After successfully joining a channel by calling with the local video module enabled.
After calling muteLocalVideoStream(true) followed by muteLocalVideoStream(false).
After calling followed by .

The SDK triggers this callback in the following scenarios:
After successfully joining a channel with the local video module enabled.
After calling muteLocalVideoStream(true) and then muteLocalVideoStream(false).
After calling and then .

The SDK triggers this callback in the following scenarios:
After successfully joining a channel with the local video module enabled.
After calling muteLocalVideoStream(true) and then muteLocalVideoStream(false).
After calling and then .

The SDK triggers this callback under the following conditions:
After successfully joining a channel by calling or with the local video module enabled.
After calling MuteLocalVideoStream(true) and then MuteLocalVideoStream(false).
After calling and then .

plentry.pd: Time interval (ms) from calling to the triggering of this callback.
Time interval in milliseconds from calling to triggering this callback.
Time interval (ms) from calling to triggering this callback.
The time interval (ms) from calling or to when this callback is triggered.
